settings.title: Dianna Heiner
settings.subheading: Dianna joined Linda's Electric Quilters in July 2001. She brings her entrepreneurial spirit and leadership skills to our team. In her spare time she likes to relax by the pool, travel, explore nature, and bake.

settings.title: Daren Heiner
settings.subheading: Daren joined Linda's Electric Quilters in September 2011. He brings his background knowledge of quality control and management to our team.Â In his spare time he likes to garden, fish, and ride bikes.

settings.title: Corey Pearson
settings.subheading: Corey joined Linda's Electric Quilters in January 2010. He brings his creative talents, marketing ideas and quilting knowledge to our team. In his spare time he likes to play with his dog Tucker, quilt, and build Legos.

settings.title: Alice Yeager
settings.subheading: Alice joined Linda's Electric Quilters in October 2021. She brings her artistic eye and customer service skills to our team. In her spare time she enjoys face-painting, traveling, playing games and spending time with family and friends.

settings.title: Shantelle Martin
settings.subheading: Shantelle joined Linda's Electric Quilters in September 2012. She brings her quilting/sewing background and customer service skills to our team. In her spare time she likes to quilt, craft, and cheer on her kids at their sporting events.
